verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <WH5329> To the chief Musician עַֽל־ <WH5921> upon הַגִּתִּ֑ית <WH1665> upon Gittith לִבְנֵי־ <WH1121> for the sons קֹ֥רַח <WH7141> of Korah מִזְמֽוֹר׃ <WH4210> A Psalm מַה־ <WH4100> How יְּדִיד֥וֹת <WH3039> How amiable מִשְׁכְּנוֹתֶ֗יךָ <WH4908> [are] thy tabernacles יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> O LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <WH6635> of hosts

נִכְסְפָ֬ה <WH3700> longeth וְגַם־ <WH1571> and even כָּלְתָ֨ה ׀ <WH3615> yea even fainteth נַפְשִׁי֮ <WH5315> My soul לְחַצְר֪וֹת <WH2691> for the courts יְה֫וָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD לִבִּ֥י <WH3820> my heart וּבְשָׂרִ֑י <WH1320> and my flesh יְ֝רַנְּנ֗וּ <WH7442> crieth out אֶ֣ל <WH413> about אֵֽל־ <WH410> God חָֽי׃ <WH2416> for the living

גַּם־ <WH1571> also צִפּ֨וֹר ׀ <WH6833> Yea the sparrow מָ֪צְאָה <WH4672> hath found בַ֡יִת <WH1004> an house וּדְר֤וֹר ׀ <WH1866> and the swallow קֵ֥ן <WH7064> a nest לָהּ֮ אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> where שָׁ֪תָה <WH7896> for herself where she may lay אֶפְרֹ֫חֶ֥יהָ <WH667> her young אֶֽת־ <WH853> מִ֭זְבְּחוֹתֶיךָ <WH4196> [even] thine altars יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> O LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <WH6635> of hosts מַ֝לְכִּ֗י <WH4428> my King וֵאלֹהָֽי׃ <WH430> and my God

אַ֭שְׁרֵי <WH835> Blessed יוֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> [are] they that dwell בֵיתֶ֑ךָ <WH1004> in thy house ע֝֗וֹד <WH5750> are ever יְֽהַלְל֥וּךָ <WH1984> they will be still praising סֶּֽלָה׃ <WH5542> thee Selah
אַשְׁרֵ֣י <WH835> Blessed אָ֭דָם <WH120> [is] the man עֽוֹז־ <WH5797> whose strength ל֥וֹ בָ֑ךְ מְ֝סִלּ֗וֹת <WH4546> [are] the ways בִּלְבָבָֽם׃ <WH3824> [is] in thee in whose heart

עֹבְרֵ֤י ׀ <WH5674> [Who] passing בְּעֵ֣מֶק <WH6010> through the valley הַ֭בָּכָא <WH1056> of Baca מַעְיָ֣ן <WH4599> it a well יְשִׁית֑וּהוּ <WH7896> make גַּם־ <WH1571> also בְּ֝רָכ֗וֹת <WH1293> the pools יַעְטֶ֥ה <WH5844> also filleth מוֹרֶֽה׃ <WH4175> the rain

יֵ֭לְכוּ <WH1980> go מֵחַ֣יִל <WH2428> from strength אֶל־ <WH413> before חָ֑יִל <WH2428> to strength יֵרָאֶ֖ה <WH7200> appeareth אֶל־ <WH413> before אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> before God בְּצִיּֽוֹן׃ <WH6726> [every one of them] in Zion

יְה֘וָ֤ה <WH3068> O LORD אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> God צְ֭בָאוֹת <WH6635> of hosts שִׁמְעָ֣ה <WH8085> hear תְפִלָּתִ֑י <WH8605> my prayer הַאֲזִ֨ינָה <WH238> give ear אֱלֹהֵ֖י <WH430> O God יַעֲקֹ֣ב <WH3290> of Jacob סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah
מָ֭גִנֵּנוּ <WH4043> our shield רְאֵ֣ה <WH7200> Behold אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> O God וְ֝הַבֵּ֗ט <WH5027> and look פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> upon the face מְשִׁיחֶֽךָ׃ <WH4899> of thine anointed

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for טֽוֹב־ <WH2896> [is] better י֥וֹם <WH3117> For a day בַּחֲצֵרֶ֗יךָ <WH2691> in thy courts מֵ֫אָ֥לֶף <WH505> than a thousand בָּחַ֗רְתִּי <WH977> I had rather הִ֭סְתּוֹפֵף <WH5605> be a doorkeeper בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> in the house אֱלֹהַ֑י <WH430> of my God מִ֝דּ֗וּר <WH1752> than to dwell בְּאָהֳלֵי־ <WH168> in the tents רֶֽשַׁע׃ <WH7562> of wickedness

כִּ֤י <WH3588> is a שֶׁ֨מֶשׁ ׀ <WH8121> [is] a sun וּמָגֵן֮ <WH4043> and shield יְהוָ֪ה <WH3068> For the LORD אֱלֹ֫הִ֥ים <WH430> God חֵ֣ן <WH2580> grace וְ֭כָבוֹד <WH3519> and glory יִתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> will give יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD לֹ֥א <WH3808> No יִמְנַע־ <WH4513> [thing] will he withhold ט֝֗וֹב <WH2896> no good לַֽהֹלְכִ֥ים <WH1980> from them that walk בְּתָמִֽים׃ <WH8549> uprightly
יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> O LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אַֽשְׁרֵ֥י <WH835> blessed אָ֝דָ֗ם <WH120> [is] the man בֹּטֵ֥חַ <WH982> that trusteth בָּֽךְ׃
